title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if separates variables

1 point is earned for antiderivatives

1 point is earned for constant of integration

1 point is earned if uses initial condition

1 point is earned if solves for y

Note: max 2/5 [1-1-0-0-0] if no constant of integration

Note: 0/5 if no separation of variables

∫ ydy= ∫ (x+1)dx y 2 2 = x 2 2 +x+c (−2) 2 2 = 0 2 2 +0+c⇒c=2 y 2 = x 2 +2x+4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaadaWdba qaaiaadMhacaWGKbGaamyEaiabg2da9maapeaabaGaaiikaiaadIha cqGHRaWkcaaIXaGaaiykaiaadsgacaWG4baaleqabeqdcqGHRiI8aa Wcbeqab0Gaey4kIipaaOqaamaalaaabaGaamyEamaaCaaaleqabaGa aGOmaaaaaOqaaiaaikdaaaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacaWG4bWaaWbaaS qabeaacaaIYaaaaaGcbaGaaGOmaaaacqGHRaWkcaWG4bGaey4kaSIa am4yaaqaamaalaaabaGaaiikaiabgkHiTiaaikdacaGGPaWaaWbaaS qabeaacaaIYaaaaaGcbaGaaGOmaaaacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaaicda daahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaakeaacaaIYaaaaiabgUcaRiaaicdacq GHRaWkcaWGJbGaeyO0H4Taam4yaiabg2da9iaaikdaaeaacaWG5bWa aWbaaSqabeaacaaIYaaaaOGaeyypa0JaamiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaG OmaaaakiabgUcaRiaaikdacaWG4bGaey4kaSIaaGinaaaaaa@67BA@

descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned if separates variables

1 point is earned for antiderivatives

1 point is earned for constant of integration

1 point is earned if uses initial condition

1 point is earned if solves for y

Note: max 2/5 [1-1-0-0-0] if no constant of integration

Note: 0/5 if no separation of variables
